user_query: I'm planning a trip to Europe and I want to stay updated on the latest climate change news. Can you provide me with articles from trusted sources like Nasa, UN, and The Guardian? Also, exclude articles from The Guardian and limit the results to 10 articles per page.

TaskList.description: Gather travel information for planning a trip to Europe.
Search for the latest climate change articles from trusted sources excluding The Guardian.
Format the retrieved articles to display only 10 articles per page.
